Description: Responsibilities:• Identify project brief & space program for proposed business development ideas.• Conduct due diligence on project design workability & permitting impacts.• Initiate pre-planning design & collaborate with stakeholders.• Develop business financial models reflecting proposed planning.• Manage design process with stakeholders, negotiate offers, and oversee deliverables.• Secure authority approvals for construction works.• Manage design package delivery based on construction strategies.• Ensure design input during construction stage & final approvals.Skills
Skills: • 5 - 10 years of experience in similar roles with renowned design companies and real estate.
• Experience in large, shell/core architectural design and presentation strategies.
• Strong leadership, communication, and relationship management skills.
• Proficient in Microsoft Office, Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Project, and CAD software.
• Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making abilities.
